projectsGoal: Create and code an animated story
tools: JS,HTML,CSS, Adobe Illustrator, Visual studio Code
aboutTheProject: This project was heavily focused on the animation and developing a story and character in a certain style, that was chosen
factsAboutTheProject: This project was an individual project. This was first experience with creating sort of a game like experience. Since this was an individual project I was responsible for all the parts of the project. I really enjoyed creating this sort of intercative story, though my drawing and designs are not strong for sure, but it was very interesting to challenge myself in this way.
For this project I drew a stroy board, filled out work sheet about the character's appearance, psichology etc.
Drew all the reuired sprite sheets and backgrounds using Adobe Illustrator
Animated the story using HTML, CSS and JS
